summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2044, for the improvement of Twenty-second Avenue, from East Olive Street to East Madison Street, all in the City of Seattle, by paving the same with asphalt laid upon a proper concrete foundation, with concrete curbs and armoured concrete corners, with brick, cement or asphalt gutters; under Ordinance No. 20556, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
